com.ibm.caas

Class CAASService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.caas.CAASService

  • public class CAASService
extends Object
    Implementation of the service which communicates with the server to authenticate and retrieve content.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CAASService(String serverURL, String contextRoot, String instance)
      Initialize this service with the specified server URL, context root and tenant.
      CAASService(String serverURL, String contextRoot, String instance, String userName, String password)
      Initialize this service with the specified server URL, context root, tenant name and credentials.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CAASService

        public CAASService(String serverURL,
           String contextRoot,
           String instance,
           String userName,
           String password)
        Initialize this service with the specified server URL, context root, tenant name and credentials.
        Parameters:
        serverURL - the base server URL in the form http[s]://hostname[:port].
        contextRoot - the web context root name, for instance "wps".
        instance - instance or tenant name, which may be null in which case it not used.
        userName - the user name for HTTP authentication.
        password - the user password for HTTP authentication.

      • CAASService

        public CAASService(String serverURL,
           String contextRoot,
           String instance)
        Initialize this service with the specified server URL, context root and tenant.
        Parameters:
        serverURL - the base server URL in the form http[s]://hostname[:port].
        contextRoot - the web context root name, for instance "wps".
        instance - instance or tenant name, which may be null in which case it not used.

    • Method Detail

      • getServerURL

        public String getServerURL()
        Get the base server URL.
        Returns:
        a string representing the base server URL in the form http[s]://hostname[:port].

      • getContextRoot

        public String getContextRoot()
        Get the context root for the MACM server. For instance: "wps".
        Returns:
        the context root name.

      • getInstance

        public String getInstance()
        Return the MACM instance name.

      • getUserName

        public String getUserName()
        Return the user name for HTTP authentication.

      • getPassword

        public String getPassword()
        Return the password for HTTP authentication.

      • getAndroidContext

        public Context getAndroidContext()
        Get the Android application Context required to access location services.

      • setAndroidContext

        public void setAndroidContext(Context androidContext)
        Get the Android application Context required to access location services.

      • signIn

        public CAASRequestResult<Void> signIn(String userName,
                             String password,
                             CAASDataCallback<Void> callback)
        Perform server basic authentication using the server URL, context root and tenant provided in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name for HTTP authentication.
        password - the user password for HTTP authentication.
        callback - callback for asynchronous propagation of the authentication result.
        Returns:
        a CAASRequestResult object encapsulating the result of the authentication request.

      • executeRequest

        public <T> CAASRequestResult<T> executeRequest(CAASRequest<T> request)
        Execute the specified request against the server.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of result returned from the server.
        Parameters:
        request - the request to execute.
        Returns:
        an object encapsulating the result of the request.

      • isSendMobileInformation

        public boolean isSendMobileInformation()
        Determine whether to send mobile contextual information with each requests.
        Returns:
        true if this service is configured to send the mobile information, false otherwise.

      • setSendMobileInformation

        public void setSendMobileInformation(boolean sendMobileInformation)
        Specify whether to send mobile contextual information with each requests.
        Parameters:
        sendMobileInformation - true to configure this service to send the mobile information, false otherwise.

      • isAllowUntrustedCertificates

        public boolean isAllowUntrustedCertificates()
        Determine whether untrusted certificates, such as self-signed certificates or certificates whose CA is not in the Android's trusted list, are allowed for HTTPS connections.
        Returns:
        true if untrusted certificates are alloowed, false otherwise.

      • setAllowUntrustedCertificates

        public void setAllowUntrustedCertificates(boolean allowUntrustedCertificates)
        Specify whether untrusted certificates, such as self-signed certificates or certificates whose CA is not in the Android's trusted list, are allowed for HTTPS connections.
        Parameters:
        allowUntrustedCertificates - true to allow untrusted certificates are alloowed, false to deny them.

      • getCookieManager

        public CookieManager getCookieManager()
        Get the object which holds session identifiers. This object can be used to perform furtther requests to the server with the same HTTP session.
        Returns:
        A CookieManager instance.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • getPerformanceStats

        public String getPerformanceStats()
        Get the object that measures the time taken by one or more http requests.
        Returns:
        a PerformanceMeasurement instance.
